cpl.readme:
It is always good to have a look at the code/~WikiText TW uses in the core tiddlers and learn from it.
With this plugin you can explore code/~WikiText core tiddlers like the UI shadow tiddlers, code snippets, macros, themes and so on.
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration
cpl.author: TonGerner
